The Bar

The Lobster House Restaurant offers two fabulous bars. Our indoor Hemmingway Bar and our Ourdoor Tiki Marina Bar. Our bartenders specialize in Tropical drinks along with our classic mixed drinks and we also have an extensive wine list .

Tropical Bar & Martinis (ALL FOR $12.95)

City Island Mojito - Lime infused Rum, Triple Sec, fresh lime juice & mint leaves

Peach Martini - Absolut Peach, Peach Schnapps, 7-up with a splash of Cranberry Juice

Chocolate Martini - Vodka, Dark Creme de Cocoa & Baileys

Cosmopolitan - Vodka, Triple Sec, Lime Juice & Cranberry Juice

Apple Martini - Apple Pucker, Vodka, and splash of sour mix

Strawberry Martini - Vodka, Peach Schnapps, Strawberry Puree and a dash of Sour Mix

Mai Tai - A blend of tropical Fruit Juices with Bacardi Rum & Amaretto

Malibu Bay Breeze - Refreshing mix of Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice, & a splash of Cranberry Juice

Jolly Rancher - A light mix of Vodka, Midori, 7-Up, & Cranberry Juice

Manhattan - Canadian Whiskey & Martini Rossi

Orange Mandarin - Absolut Mandarin, splash of Grand Marnier,1 orange slice

Berry Tini - Stoli Razz, Stoli Blueberi, Splash of Cranberry, Strawberry Puree & Sour Mix

Blue Ocean - A frozen mix of Alize Blue, Malibu Rum, Pineapple Juice & Coconut

Bikini Martini - Coconut Rum, Vodka, Pineapple juice & dash of Blue Curacao

French Martini - Absolut Vodka, Chambord Liqueur, & Pineapple Juice
